mapper.select: SELECT id, client_id, client_name, group_name, email, phone, op_user, create_time FROM client_list where client_name = #{clientName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client_list (client_id, client_name, group_name, email, phone, op_user, create_time) VALUES (#{clientName}, #{clientName}, #{groupName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{opUser}, NOW())
